verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
one thing i desire
only this i seek
just to dwell dwell dwell here forever

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
this will be my posture
laying at your feet
oh just to dwell dwell dwell
here forever

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
dearest father, closest friend
most beautiful, most beautiful

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
beauty beauty beautiful
glory glory glorious
you are
you are

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
take me into your throne room
let me see your beauty
let me see your face
